name: Ancient Sword
description: A powerful and ancient sword with a rich history.
looks: The Ancient Sword has a long and curved blade made of a mysterious metal. The hilt is adorned with intricate carvings and gemstones. The sword exudes an aura of power and mystique.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

special_effects.enchantment: The Ancient Sword has been enchanted with a powerful spell that increases its damage.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell, which allows the user to cast a powerful fireball at their enemies.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is made of aged parchment, with intricate runes and symbols etched onto its surface in bright red ink.

special_effects.ignite: Has a chance to set targets on fire, causing additional damage over time.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell, which allows the user to shoot a powerful ball of fire at their enemies.
looks: The scroll is made of aged and worn parchment, with intricate symbols and runes inscribed in red ink. It is tied with a crimson ribbon.

special_effects.spell_cast: Allows the user to cast the Fireball spell.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a silver finish. The handle is wrapped with a leather grip for better grip and control.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavyweight armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the thighs. It also has shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel.
looks: The gauntlets are made from polished steel and cover the hands and lower arms. They have articulated joints for flexibility and small spikes on the knuckles for added protection.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: These steel gauntlets are made of thick plates, covering the entire hand and extending up the forearm. They have a medieval design with a rounded shape and multiple metal rivets.

name: Leather Gloves
description: A pair of flexible gloves made from high-quality leather.
looks: The leather gloves are made from soft, supple leather that fits snugly on the hands. They have reinforced stitching on the palms and fingers for added durability.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of solid steel, providing excellent protection for the hands.
looks: The steel gauntlets cover the entire hand and extend up the forearm. They have a polished silver finish and are engraved with intricate patterns.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword with a sharp blade and a leather-wrapped handle.
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade that is approximately 30 inches long. The blade is polished to a reflective sheen and has a slight curve towards the tip. The handle is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Warrior's Sword
description: A sturdy sword designed for skilled warriors.
looks: The Warrior's Sword has a blade made of polished steel with a slight curve. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a firm grip, and the pommel is ornately decorated.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade made of iron. It has a simple hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Grass Cutter
description: A tool used to cut grass and shrubs
looks: The grass cutter is a long-handled tool with a sharp metal blade at the end. It has a wooden handle and a curved blade for easier cutting.
